## Description {#details}

This pass does misc.

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> optimizations on IR before instruction selection.

<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Emit an expansion of 1 / Src good for 1ulp that supports denormals.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ac1d678087a1611e0748d3c481e076b0c"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ac1d678087a1611e0748d3c481e076b0c">AMDGPUCodeGenPrepareImpl::emitRcpIEEE1ULP</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsNegative)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Same as for 1.0, but expand the sign out of the constant.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -1 / x -&gt; rcp (fneg x)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsNegative)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><Highlight kind="normal">    Src = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ae44006b91094939f6ea72655e8312504">CreateFNeg</a>(Src);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The rcp instruction doesn&#39;t support denormals, so scale the input</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// out of the denormal range and convert at the end.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Expand as 2^-n &#42; (1.0 / (x &#42; 2^n))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Skip scaling if input is known never denormal and the input</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// range won&#39;t underflow to denormal. The hard part is knowing the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// result. We need a range check, the result could be denormal for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0x1p+126 &lt; den &lt;= 0x1p+127.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;FrexpMant, FrexpExp&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ada0bab36c5ec58b16a657a0ec09cb641">getFrexpResults</a>(Builder, Src);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Optimizations is performed based on fpmath, fast math flags as well as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// denormals to optimize fdiv with either rcp or fdiv.fast.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// With rcp:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   1/x -&gt; rcp(x) when rcp is sufficiently accurate or inaccurate rcp is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                 allowed with unsafe-fp-math or afn.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   a/b -&gt; a&#42;rcp(b) when inaccurate rcp is allowed with unsafe-fp-math or afn.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// With fdiv.fast:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   a/b -&gt; fdiv.fast(a, b) when !fpmath &gt;= 2.5ulp with denormals flushed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   1/x -&gt; fdiv.fast(1,x)  when !fpmath &gt;= 2.5ulp.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE: rcp is the preference in cases that both are legal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ae534b46b7607eb604ddd8c66baa8d2d1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ae534b46b7607eb604ddd8c66baa8d2d1">AMDGPUCodeGenPrepareImpl::visitFDiv</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &amp;FDiv) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Figure out how many bits are really needed for this division.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ComputeNumSignBits/computeKnownBits call if the first one is</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RHSSignBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad46ed333b920b20e78d948610366254c">ComputeNumSignBits</a>(Den, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ad6fa8252711b6da609826cdf5f7076b2">DL</a>, 0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#af2afde5f3a04ce2c576e01f9a8396ba9">AC</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A sign bit needs to be reserved for shrinking.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DivBits = SSBits - RHSSignBits + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DivBits &gt; MaxDivBits)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHSSignBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad46ed333b920b20e78d948610366254c">ComputeNumSignBits</a>(Num, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ad6fa8252711b6da609826cdf5f7076b2">DL</a>, 0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#af2afde5f3a04ce2c576e01f9a8396ba9">AC</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RHSSignBits = Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a7f47812e8e75b0616a97d7004e5fb909">countMinLeadingZeros</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DivBits = SSBits - RHSSignBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DivBits &gt; MaxDivBits)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><Highlight kind="normal">  Known = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab2c2c51743fb4a1b17c59563909f3f24">computeKnownBits</a>(Num, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ad6fa8252711b6da609826cdf5f7076b2">DL</a>, 0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#af2afde5f3a04ce2c576e01f9a8396ba9">AC</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHSSignBits = Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#a7f47812e8e75b0616a97d7004e5fb909">countMinLeadingZeros</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extend in register from the number of bits this divide really is.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsSigned) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><Highlight kind="normal">      Res = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa4f2cec52a8e17a4c72319334fbef771">CreateAnd</a>(Res, TruncMask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Res;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to recognize special cases the DAG will emit special, better expansions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// than the general expansion we do here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: It would be better to just directly handle those optimizations here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a> = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#add2225af2af25968f26ed4cb0db94dbe">CreateXor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, SignY);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The algorithm here is based on ideas from &quot;Software Integer Division&quot;, Tom</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rodeheffer, August 2008</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unsigned udiv(unsigned x, unsigned y) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   // Initial estimate of inv(y). The constant is less than 2^32 to ensure</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   // that this is a lower bound on inv(y), even if some of the calculations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   // round up.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   unsigned z = (unsigned)((4294967296.0 - 512.0) &#42; v&#95;rcp&#95;f32((float)y));</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   // One round of UNR (Unsigned integer Newton-Raphson) to improve z.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   // Empirically this is guaranteed to give a &quot;two-y&quot; lower bound on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   // inv(y).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   z += umulh(z, -y &#42; z);</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   // Quotient/remainder estimate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   unsigned q = umulh(x, z);</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   unsigned r = x - q &#42; y;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   // Two rounds of quotient/remainder refinement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (r &gt;= y) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     ++q;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     r -= y;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (r &gt;= y) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     ++q;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     r -= y;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   return q;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initial estimate of inv(y).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We consider PHI nodes as part of &quot;chains&quot;, so given a PHI node I, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// recursively consider all its users and incoming values that are also PHI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// nodes. We then make a decision about all of those PHIs at once. Either they</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// all get broken up, or none of them do. That way, we avoid cases where a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// single PHI is/is not broken and we end up reforming/exploding a vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// multiple times, or even worse, doing it in a loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const PHINode &#42;, 8&gt;</a> WorkList;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that none of the PHI nodes in the worklist are in the map. If some of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// them are, it means we&#39;re not good enough at collecting related PHIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;WLP : WorkList) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a0e35c50e56716a12652b406bb7364b68">BreakPhiNodesCache</a>.count(WLP) == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To consider a PHI profitable to break, we need to see some interesting</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// incoming values. At least 2/3rd (rounded up) of all PHIs in the worklist</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// must have one to consider all PHIs breakable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This threshold has been determined through performance testing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that the computation below is equivalent to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    (unsigned)ceil((K / 3.0) &#42; 2)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It&#39;s simply written this way to avoid mixing integral/FP arithmetic.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Threshold = (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a0e1c3175b0ac22fe3853651c28e1ecb8">size</a>() &#42; 2, 3) / 3);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumBreakablePHIs = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CanBreak = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;Cur : WorkList) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t break PHIs that have no interesting incoming values. That is, where</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there is no clear opportunity to fold the &quot;extractelement&quot; instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we would add.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: IC does not run after this pass, so we&#39;re only interested in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// foldings that the DAG combiner can do.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(Cur-&gt;incoming&#95;values(), <a href="#a77de311a4aa9ca492ad4fd8e6a363186">isInterestingPHIIncomingValue</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (++NumBreakablePHIs &gt;= Threshold) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><Highlight kind="normal">        CanBreak = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Helper class for &quot;break large PHIs&quot; (visitPHINode).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This represents a slice of a PHI&#39;s incoming value, which is made up of:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><Highlight kind="comment">///   - The type of the slice (Ty)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><Highlight kind="comment">///   - The index in the incoming value&#39;s vector where the slice starts (Idx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><Highlight kind="comment">///   - The number of elements in the slice (NumElts).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It also keeps track of the NewPHI node inserted for this particular slice.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Slice examples:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;4 x i64&gt; -&gt; Split into four i64 slices.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><Highlight kind="comment">///     -&gt; &#91;i64, 0, 1&#93;, &#91;i64, 1, 1&#93;, &#91;i64, 2, 1&#93;, &#91;i64, 3, 1&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;5 x i16&gt; -&gt; Split into 2 &lt;2 x i16&gt; slices + a i16 tail.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><Highlight kind="comment">///     -&gt; &#91;&lt;2 x i16&gt;, 0, 2&#93;, &#91;&lt;2 x i16&gt;, 2, 2&#93;, &#91;i16, 4, 1&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#abcfe9b938404c5c07c3c426aca33199b">VectorSlice</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#abcfe9b938404c5c07c3c426aca33199b"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#abcfe9b938404c5c07c3c426aca33199b">VectorSlice</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a83d46be9cc7330b1ccc1600f7b7c4b51">Ty</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15">Idx</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#af1a8f7a1af3bdd7443dedbc655aad350">NumElts</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><Highlight kind="normal">      : <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a83d46be9cc7330b1ccc1600f7b7c4b51">Ty</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a83d46be9cc7330b1ccc1600f7b7c4b51">Ty</a>), <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15">Idx</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15">Idx</a>), <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#af1a8f7a1af3bdd7443dedbc655aad350">NumElts</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#af1a8f7a1af3bdd7443dedbc655aad350">NumElts</a>) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1906"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1907" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a83d46be9cc7330b1ccc1600f7b7c4b51"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a83d46be9cc7330b1ccc1600f7b7c4b51">Ty</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1908" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15">Idx</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#af1a8f7a1af3bdd7443dedbc655aad350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#af1a8f7a1af3bdd7443dedbc655aad350">NumElts</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#ae5fd35a263da73de3e3a0ef18f77ef6c"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#ae5fd35a263da73de3e3a0ef18f77ef6c">NewPHI</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Slice \\p Inc according to the information contained within this slice.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is cached, so if called multiple times for the same \\p BB &amp; \\p Inc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// pair, it returns the same Sliced value as well.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note this &#42;intentionally&#42; does not return the same value for, say,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#91;%bb.0, %0&#93; &amp; &#91;%bb.1, %0&#93; as:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - It could cause issues with dominance (e.g. if bb.1 is seen first, then</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   the value in bb.1 may not be reachable from bb.0 if it&#39;s its</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   predecessor.)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - We also want to make our extract instructions as local as possible so</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   the DAG has better chances of folding them out. Duplicating them like</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   that is beneficial in that regard.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is both a minor optimization to avoid creating duplicate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instructions, but also a requirement for correctness. It is not forbidden</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// for a PHI node to have the same &#91;BB, Val&#93; pair multiple times. If we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// returned a new value each time, those previously identical pairs would all</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// have different incoming values (from the same block) and it&#39;d cause a &quot;PHI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// node has multiple entries for the same basic block with different incoming</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// values!&quot; verifier error.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#aef12c412e54fb31aa597199eadc0e866"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#aef12c412e54fb31aa597199eadc0e866">getSlicedVal</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Inc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> NewValName) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp;Res = SlicedVals&#91;&#123;BB, Inc&#125;&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Res)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Res;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.SetCurrentDebugLocation(IncInst-&gt;getDebugLoc());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#af1a8f7a1af3bdd7443dedbc655aad350">NumElts</a> &gt; 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 4&gt;</a> Mask;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> K = <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15">Idx</a>; K &lt; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#a891a7aade567413c2bcf94dc3239fb15">Idx</a> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/vectorslice/#af1a8f7a1af3bdd7443dedbc655aad350">NumElts</a>); ++K)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><Highlight kind="normal">      Res = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateShuffleVector(Inc, Mask, NewValName);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;std::pair&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, Value &#42;&gt;</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&gt; SlicedVals;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#aef67bcdb0247f9b4b984725fa065e1ce"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#aef67bcdb0247f9b4b984725fa065e1ce">AMDGPUCodeGenPrepareImpl::visitPHINode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Break-up fixed-vector PHIs into smaller pieces.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Default threshold is 32, so it breaks up any vector that&#39;s &gt;32 bits into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// its elements, or into 32-bit pieces (for 8/16 bit elts).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is only helpful for DAGISel because it doesn&#39;t handle large PHIs as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// well as GlobalISel. DAGISel lowers PHIs by using CopyToReg/CopyFromReg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// With large, odd-sized PHIs we may end up needing many &#96;build&#95;vector&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operations with most elements being &quot;undef&quot;. This inhibits a lot of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// optimization opportunities and can result in unreasonably high register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pressure and the inevitable stack spilling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/#a1dff2a9feda65e02c09974c544c8c4ff">BreakLargePHIs</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aff30786f1ea13c3ea475acce504571e4">getCGPassBuilderOption</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/targetpassconfig-cpp/#a96ee83741efbaafdb0df1eb8eff27d1b">EnableGlobalISelOption</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/#acd5e4cd8d0b926539e5d784be7234af4">ForceBreakLargePHIs</a> &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#a473885e550a15e1490b4de7f4ebd245f">canBreakPHINode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;VectorSlice&gt; Slices;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;EltTy = FVT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype/#afdce715c901d62e2c1367a0ff5248175">getElementType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For 8/16 bits type, don&#39;t scalarize fully but break it up into as many</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 32-bit slices as we can, and scalarize the tail.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EltSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpucodegenprepare-cpp-/amdgpucodegenprepareimpl/#ad6fa8252711b6da609826cdf5f7076b2">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(EltTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElts = FVT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#a1893caf878859959ba6a3d5442ef1439">getNumElements</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EltSize == 8 || EltSize == 16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SubVecSize = (32 / EltSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;SubVecTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype/#af9a870d5df50fe0133a410b7c9114c80">FixedVectorType::get</a>(EltTy, SubVecSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> End = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41896492f62ee8d25cf8aaad70bd88aa">alignDown</a>(NumElts, SubVecSize); Idx &lt; End;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><Highlight kind="normal">           Idx += SubVecSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><Highlight kind="normal">        Slices.emplace&#95;back(SubVecTy, Idx, SubVecSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scalarize all remaining elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; Idx &lt; NumElts; ++Idx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><Highlight kind="normal">      Slices.emplace&#95;back(EltTy, Idx, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Slices.size() &gt; 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create one PHI per vector piece. The &quot;VectorSlice&quot; class takes care of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// have inserted something into I&#39;s BB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.SetInsertPoint(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getParent()-&gt;getFirstNonPHIIt());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Vec = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/poisonvalue/#a1bf08613fb664a2e377a9a72c59a6b66">PoisonValue::get</a>(FVT);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2036"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.eraseFromParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2038"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2039"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2040"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param V  Value to check</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2041"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param DL DataLayout</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2042"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param TM TargetMachine (TODO: remove once DL contains nullptr values)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2043"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param AS Target Address Space</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2044"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return true if \\p V cannot be the null value of \\p AS, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2045" lineLink="#af897cc9cadd4ddd140100754cd3fca4d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#af897cc9cadd4ddd140100754cd3fca4d">isPtrKnownNeverNull</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
